messages.speech: Digital transformation in the business context has given rise to the need of creating software platforms, and enabling infrastructure and software as a service. There have been revolutionary technical advances that have taken place in the last 5 years and now some of the core engineering jobs of the future are in the infrastructure space. This talk will give you a perspective on next gen technologies and software led enablement of IT Infrastructure, including how analytics are being effectively used in modern day data centres. How else may I help you?
